markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hunting Spider Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=118)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 552 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This venom erodes its target's defenses, aiding the spider in securing prey.

**Saving Throw** DC 21 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d10 poison damage and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d12 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and flat-footed (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and flat-footed (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Hunting Spider Venom
